languages.text: Встреченный разведчик утверждает, что в глубине улья остались выжившие. Самый простой способ найти их убежище — пробраться внутрь по тайному ходу.

traits.locale_text: Встреченный разведчик утверждает, что в глубине улья остались выжившие. Самый простой путь найти их убежище — пробраться внутрь по тайному ходу.

languages.text: The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest way to find their hideout is to go through a secret passage.
languages.original_text: Встреченный разведчик утверждает, что в глубине улья остались выжившие. Самый простой способ найти их убежище — пробраться внутрь по тайному ходу.

traits.locale_text: The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest route to their hideout is through a secret passage.
The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest route to their hideout is through a secret passage.
The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest route to their hideout is through a secret passage.
The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest way to find their hideout is to go through a secret passage.
The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest way to find their hideout is to go through a secret passage.

languages.text: 斥候声称，巢都深处还有更多幸存者。若是想前往他们所在的藏身之处，最简单的方法就是穿过某条秘密通道。
languages.original_text: The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest way to find their hideout is to go through a secret passage.

traits.locale_text: 斥候声称，巢都深处还有更多幸存者。若是想前往他们所在的藏身之处，最简单的方法就是穿过某条秘密通道。

languages.text: 偵察は、ハイヴの奥にはさらに生存者がいると主張する。彼らの隠れ家を見つける最も簡単な方法は、秘密の通路を通り抜けることだ。
languages.original_text: The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest way to find their hideout is to go through a secret passage.

traits.locale_text: 偵察は、ハイヴの奥にはさらに生存者がいると主張する。彼らの隠れ家を見つける最も簡単な方法は、秘密の通路を通り抜けることだ。

languages.text: El explorador asegura que hay más supervivientes en las profundidades de la colmena. El camino más fácil a su escondite es a través de un pasaje secreto.
languages.original_text: The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest way to find their hideout is to go through a secret passage.

traits.locale_text: El explorador asegura que hay más supervivientes en las profundidades de la colmena. El camino más fácil a su escondite es a través de un pasaje secreto.

languages.text: Der Scout behauptet, dass es in den Tiefen der Makropole weitere Überlebende gibt. Der einfachste Weg, ihr Versteck zu finden, ist ein geheimer Gang.
languages.original_text: The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest way to find their hideout is to go through a secret passage.

traits.locale_text: Der Scout behauptet, dass es in den Tiefen der Makropole weitere Überlebende gibt. Der einfachste Weg, ihr Versteck zu finden, ist ein geheimer Gang.

languages.text: L'éclaireur affirme qu'il y a d'autres survivants plus loin dans la ruche. Le moyen le plus rapide d'atteindre leur cachette est d'emprunter un passage secret.
languages.original_text: The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest way to find their hideout is to go through a secret passage.

traits.locale_text: L'éclaireur affirme qu'il y a d'autres survivants plus loin dans la ruche. Le moyen le plus rapide d'atteindre leur cachette est d'emprunter un passage secret.

languages.text: Keşif eri, kovanın derinliklerinde hayatta kalan daha fazla kişi olduğunu iddia ediyor. Sığınağı bulmanın en kolay yolu, gizli bir geçitten geçmek.
languages.original_text: The scout claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. The easiest way to find their hideout is to go through a secret passage.

traits.locale_text: Gözcü, kovanın derinliklerinde hayatta kalan daha fazla kişinin olduğunu iddia ediyor. Sığınağı bulmanın en kolay yolu, gizli bir geçitten geçmek.
